entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 12:18PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Outagamie County through 100 PM CDT... At 1217 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Black Creek, or 10 miles north of Appleton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail.
